docs.title: Hello, Hamza here, it's very nice to meet you
docs.text:
I am a Mechatronics Engineer. I spend my time in code scripts or parts documentations. Always excited for a new challenge.

Quick Overview of my skills are as such:

Groups Tools Programming Languages C++, Python, Verilog, Linux Robotics Frameworks ROS1 & 2, Gazebo, MoveIt2, Ardupilot, MavLink Computer Aided Engineering ANSYS, FreeCAD, MATLAB, Altium, KiCAD, Docker Team Collaboration ZOOM, Microsoft Teams, Jira Documentation` Git, GitHub, LaTeX, Office Suite

docs.title: M.Eng. Mechatronics and Cyber Physical Systems(Full-Time)
docs.text:
Technische Hochschule Deggendorf                                                                          Mar 2024 – Present Germany Focus on:

  • Additive Manufacturing Technologies
  • Robotics & Autonomous Systems
  • AR/VR for Human Interface & Industrial Engineering
  • Functional Safety & Cyber-Physical Systems

docs.title: B.Sc. Electrical Engineering
docs.text:
GIK Institute of Engineering Sciences and Technology                                         Sep 2018 – May 2022 Pakistan Focus on:

  • Power Engineering: Electric Machines / Instrumentation / Power Utilization / Power Electronics
  • Electronics Engineering: Linear Circuit Analysis / Digital Logic Design / Microprocessor System   / Digital Logic Design
  • Control Systems Engineering: Digital Signal Processing / Digital Image Processing / Signals &  Systems / Probability
  • Management / Economics: Operations Mgt. / Engr. Economics / Total Quality Mgt. /  Occupational Health & Safety

docs.title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer(Full-Time)
docs.text:
SOCO Engineers GmBH                                                                                             Aug 2024 – Dec 2024 Pakistan

  • Built automation scripts for simulation tools using Python, C++ and bash and achieved results quicker.
  • Implemented Machine Learning Algorithms to processing pipelines, improving test results by 15%.
  • Worked in cross-functional teams for documentation and version control.

docs.title: Electrical Engineer(Full-Time)
docs.text:
Faculty of Aerial Research & Integrated Systems                                                  Nov 2023 – July 2024 Pakistan

  • Modelled Systems in MATLAB to create Feedback Systems for flight simulations.
  • Calibrated electronics and sensors, and assembled mechanical frames for outdoor flights.
  • Documented and recorded flight results for logging and debugging.

docs.title: Face Detection System
docs.text:
Computer Vision Reinforcement Learning

Tech Stack: Camera, Python ,Detection Algorithm, Recognition Algorithm

A computer vision system using a pre-trained ML model to detect and recognize faces in real time.

Key Features: - Real-time face detection - Feature extraction - Face recognition database

docs.title: Gender Recognition System
docs.text:
Audio Processing Noise Filtering Feature Extraction

Tech Stack: Microphone, MATLAB Script, Noise filter and Feature Extraction

Voice-based gender classification using audio feature extraction and supervised learning techniques.

Key Features: - Audio preprocessing - Feature extraction - ML classification - GUI interface

docs.title: 2D Plotter Machine
docs.text:
Control System G-Code Generation Mix Signal System

Tech Stack: Vector Drawing/File, Microcontroller, Motor Drivers , Stepper Motors

A CNC-style plotting machine for vector graphics.

Key Features: - Precision motor control - Vector plotting - Foldable mechanical frame

docs.title: Bluetooth Controlled RC Car
docs.text:
IoT Wireless Communication Pulse Width Modulation*(PWM) Motor Control

Tech Stack: Bluetooth Command, Microcontroller, Motor Drivers, DC Motors

A smartphone-controlled RC car using Bluetooth communication.

Key Features: - Bluetooth control from any smartphone - Speed and direction regulation - Wireless system

docs.title: Functional Prosthetic Hand Assembly
docs.text:
Control System Signal Processing Tendon-driven Actuators Additive Manufacturing

Tech Stack: EMG Sensor, Amplifier, Microcontroller, Motor Driver PCB , Stepper Motors

A bio-inspired 3D printed prosthetic hand controlled via EMG muscle signals.

Key Features: - EMG acquisition and filtering - Motor control system - Assistive robotics design

docs.title: 6 DOF Robotic Arm Assembly
docs.text:
Control System Automation Digital Twin

Tech Stack: LabVIEW, Microcontroller, Motor Driver PCB

A robotic manipulator capable of precise 3D motion control.

Key Features: - 6-axis movement - Custom PCB integration - Real-time control

docs.title: Maze Solving Robot
docs.text:
Wall Follower & Pledge Algorithm Autonomous System 3D Modelling

Tech Stack: Sensors, Microcontroller, Motor Driver PCB, DC Motors

An autonomous robot capable of finding shortest path in a maze.

Key Features: - Path optimization logic - Sensor-based navigation - Memory storage
